page.title: 16CLUBS AND INDUSTRY.
page.content: {CAPPER PASS SOCIAL CLUB}has many different kinds of sports.They have 4 dart teams,4 or 5 bowling teams,4 football teams,2 cricket teams,some squash teams and 3 table tennis teams.Mr.Kane plays cricket and football for the Capper Pass Social Club.The Social Club is not open for the public it is only open for the Capper Pass people.Only members over 16 are allowed in after 8.00p.m. as alcohol is on sale. The Capper Pass Rifle Club started on the 1st. of January 1985. It was inspected by the Army and the police. The people in the club were given a licence to shoot at targets.A colonel came to check safety precautions and to put wooden beams over the metal objects and plugs. The Rifle Club is part of Capper Pass Social Club.
